column4: hey, can anyone tell me which driver goes with my hard drive?
I have a Dell Latitude XT.
can anyone tell me which driver goes with my hard drive?
I have a Samsung Model HS 122JC
harddrives are usually found by hal, any special device ?
Ubuntu 9.04 (the text version) recognizes that there's one present, and
gives me a list to choose from.
so it's detected
what's hal?  ...yes.
it detects it, then asks which driver suits it.
I don't know, and I'm not sure where to go to find out.
!who | mscyber07 ; hardware abstraction layer
where do you hang then ?
!DasEi what do you mean where do I hang?
you asked for a driver for your hardware, though ubuntu's kernel seems to fit it (the "!") triggers the channel ro-bot
the kernel fits, I'm just not sure WHICH driver goes with my hardware.
I don't want to screw it up by giving it the wrong one.
you can't, you can choose partitoning at install, not kernelbehavior
I've got the install going right now.  Would you like to private chat and walk me thru it?
I won't stay up long (up since more then 35 h), why private, it's common sense here
http://www.howtoforge.com/the-perfect-desktop-ubuntu-9.04
thanks, I'll give it a try.
